How it works

Step 1

Bootstrap straight from your web app

Copy and paste your web app url into Desktop.Customize yuor app and design,app icon and window frame Ui with no code.

    Multiple Window
    offline support
    Luanch on startup
    Menubar/tray menus
    Customisable menus
    Tabs(Mac only)

Clickup used to Desktop to get their desktop app in front of customer in days instead of months.

"To Desktop provided us with a polished desktop app in no time.Their expert team guided us through a smooth migration from our outdated legacy desktop app,enabling us to deliver new and improved features to our customer within days."

Founder & CEO, ClickUp
